body.name: Ensenior 24 Inch LED Under Cabinet Lighting 5CCT, 14W 930LM, Hardwired & Plug-in, 2700K/3000K/3500K/4000K/5000K, Dimmable Under Counter Lights for Kitchen Housing-FCC
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 41 mins
features: 💡【5 Color Adjustable】 The cabinet light can be adjusted to 5 color temperatures (2700K, 3000K, 3500K, 4000K, 5000K) and 5 brightness levels (0%, 5%, 10%, 20%, 50%, 100%). Being able to match the other light and enjoying the new lighting atmosphere in the room. CRI≥90.
💡【Easy to Install】Plug-in light easy installation. It perfectly solves the disadvantage that the wiring system makes it impossible to install additional lights. Let the light in every corner.

💡【Wide Application】The cabinet light strips have even light distribution for narrow cabinets, and kitchen sinks. Which fit for kitchens, office cabinets, under-cabinet laundry, bookcases, closets, and more.
💡【Energy-Saving & Durable】lifespan is 50,000 hours. This under desk light is energy efficient, safe, and durable. 10W 650LM LED lights produce more light but less heat.
💡【Packaging All】24in*0.98in*2.8in. Ultra-thin design, widely applicable. A connector is included in the package so if you buy more than 2 pcs, they can connect seamlessly together.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug in & Hardwired LED Under Cabinet Light This lighting fixture is designed to deliver enhanced brightness to your kitchen, ensuring a seamless blend of functionality and comfort in your daily life and work.

A Great Choice for Your Kitchen Choose Ensenior! Ensenior offers one-on-one support within 12 hours, with a 30-day return policy and 5-year coverage. With over 10 million fixtures sold in just 3 years, we aim to upgrade your house with innovative products and exceptional service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice under cabinet feature
reviews.reviewText: liked price and valu. A nice versatile under cabinet light. Wish there were more instructions or you tube videos vailaable to show how to link 3 or 4 units better together. I had to cut and solder the connecting wires because of lack of instructions . Too many diferent you tubes on LED lighting on web

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked well I liked the way that the lights work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice under-counter (or desk) lamp!
reviews.reviewText: I have a reception desk which is awesome with 2 spaces but makes the lower desk space very dark for working and taking pictures. This lamp is AWESOME! It comes with MANY options. It can be powered by hard wiring OR by simply plugging into an outlet. It also comes with hardware to screw it to the underneath of the counter or desk, but I chose to use double stick tape (not included). On the face of the light are 2 additional options. The on/off switch can be turned to dim to bright (and several steps in between). It also has several different color temps of light. I've shown an image of the desk prior to the light install, then one with the fully bright yellow light, and finally, one with the fully bright white light. Personally I prefer the white light. The dim to bright options are noticeable in person, but less obvious in pictures, so you'll just have to trust me on that. The user manual claims 50,000 hours of life, which obviously can't be assessed. I am very pleased with this unit and anticipate many beneficial hours and uses. I don't think you could go wrong with this item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent light with minor concerns
reviews.reviewText: This reviews the 24 inch model of this light, which is bright and has nice manual features, such as dimmability and color temperature adjustment.We got it to replace an old 24 inch fluorescent fixture under a cabinet. This meant the option to hardwire the light in using the existing wiring, which led us to discover a couple of minor concerns. One is that the slim and sleek design of the light means that there isn't much room inside for additional wiring. For us, we had to find some way to deal with the extra wiring coming out of our wall.Second is that the two mounting screws are quite thin and so seem to be at their limit to secure the light.The screws also have ~1/2 inch that sticks out beyond the light to go into the bottom of our cabinet, which is 3/4 inch thick. That may be the minimum thickness required to prevent the screw from poking out into the cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased 3 of these units of different sizes. All provide excellent light. Direct wiring installation is a pain but this was mostly due to the existing wiring. My main complaint is the switches. They are cheap and difficult to use. The color change switches are the most difficult to use and sometimes are impossible to move. Granted, once you have the color you are happy with, you would usually not need to change color.The on/off switches can be troublesome and we use them daily. I hope they eventually do not fail from daily use. The switch issue needs to be addressed by the manufacturer.Edited Review: I left a 3 star rating several days ago primarily complaining about the switches. Within 2 days I was contacted by the vendor/manufacturer addressing my concerns. I was astounded by their response and communication, never expecting a response such as that. I would rate this company 5 stars for customer service and would highly recommend them. I have purchased a lot of "stuff" through Amazon, and never been this impressed with a vendor here. I still have an issue with the switches, but feel confident they will improve the switches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Lighting Solution for Any Kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed the Ensenior 24 Inch LED Under Cabinet Lighting in my kitchen, and I'm beyond impressed with its performance and versatility.The 5 Color Temperature options are a game-changer. I can now tailor the lighting to suit different tasks and moods, from warm and cozy ambiance to bright and focused task lighting. The 930 lumens provide ample illumination without being harsh on the eyes.Installation was a breeze. I opted for the hardwired setup, but the plug-in option is equally convenient for those who prefer it. The included instructions were clear and easy to follow, making it a hassle-free process.The dimmable feature is a standout. It allows me to adjust the brightness to my liking, which is perfect for creating the right atmosphere during dinner parties or for late-night snacking without disturbing the household.I also appreciate the sleek and low-profile design. It seamlessly blends into my kitchen decor without being obtrusive. The build quality feels sturdy and durable, and it's clear that Ensenior pays attention to detail.Additionally, knowing that it is FCC certified provides an extra level of confidence in its safety and quality.Overall, the Ensenior 24 Inch LED Under Cabinet Lighting is a fantastic addition to any kitchen. Its customizable lighting options, ease of installation, and high-quality build make it a standout product. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their kitchen lighting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars bigger than expected
reviews.reviewText: This thing is big. I wanted it to add light beneath the top of my desk so the keyboard had a light on top but cannot use it for that, too big.Moving from the size, there is nothing to complain. The lamp is well built and has options for plenty of uses.For a closet light of under cabinet it would be perfect.The included installation options and power allows for versatility.Light is very bright too.
